discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: Thanks for the changelog entry, I indeed forgot it.

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment: Unfortunately, this breaks analysis in the CI because it's mathcomp_extra file tries to redeclare the coercion which is unfortunately an error. I have to think about a transition plan :cry:

discussion.author: pi8027
discussion.comment:
> Unfortunately, this breaks analysis in the CI because it's mathcomp_extra file tries to redeclare the coercion which is unfortunately an error. I have to think about a transition plan cry

@proux01 What about:
```coq
From mathcomp Require choice.
Coercion Choice.mixin : ... .
Import choice.
````
in `mathcomp_extra`?

discussion.author: proux01
discussion.comment:
Thanks @pi8027 this seems to work, so we could:
* merge https://github.com/math-comp/analysis/pull/654
* relaunch CI here
* provided it's green, merge here

discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment: The CI seems to indicate that MathComp-Analysis compiles with this commit and KS's trick. Let's merge? @proux01

commits.author: proux01
commits.message:
Add missing coercion

From the mathcomp_extra.v file fo Analysis.

Co-authored-by: Cyril Cohen <cohen@crans.org>
